comments: Read the chapters, look over the websites she gives and you got yourself an A. Pay attention to the comments she gives on your assignments because if you do not apply them into future ones she will take points off, which I found to be completely reasonable. She will also give you more if she sees that you put in extra work into the assignment.

comments: If you don\'t mind her slight Polish accent and having to participate frequently during class, Dr. B is a very good instructor. Lectures may not be the most thrilling but she has plenty of real word experiences to share which is cool. Quizzes are tricky but doable if you read & study the chapters. Final essay and project is stressful but also doable

comments: I\'m not sure how she doesn\'t have a 5.0 rating. She is awesome. I had her for Soc 101 as well as an online class for Swk 101. She is amazing. She is very organized & willing to help! She offers lots of extra credit! She is very understanding of college students\' lives. I recommend anyone to take her! She is also funny! Tiny accent. TAKE HER!!!

comments: NOT a good online teacher. Blackboard assignments/posts are not listed in date order. Work is deleted after completed-you can\'t go back to review Power Points or your own work-save everything! She doesn\'t allow you to review your Quizzes or Tests as you\'re taking them-once you answer a question, it\'s gone - no option to change answers. Avoid her.

comments: Hybrid Course. Def recommend, only meet once a week and all the quizzes were due Sunday @ 11:59 pm (mostly online). Discussion Board and participation counted for points. Very nice lady but strict classroom rules. No phones, and only 2 excused absences. Easy A if you followed along with her lectures and the textbook.

comments: If you don\'t do well under pressure I suggest you don\'t take her for the online course. She only allows a minute per question as well. Even even if you try and get a bad grade on one assignment it drops your grade drastically and she is not lenient at all with any assignments. By far the worst online class ever taken!!!

comments: She is an excellent teacher. Makes sure everyone is on the same page as her. Very little homework. There are 2 small research papers and 1 presentation. She does a lot of group activities during class, but they are short and fun. Quite a few extra credit opportunities which is what helped me get an A! Definitely have to study for tests and quizzes.
